title: Facebook Co-Founder Chris Hughes: 'It's time to break up Facebook'
text: Yahoo Finance's RIck Newman, Myles Udland and Brian Sozzi discuss Chris Hughes Op-Ed in the New York Times and the complicated issue of breaking up Facebook and tech regulation.

title: Facebook is not a monopoly and breaking it up would be government overreach
text: Facebook is not a monopoly in its actual market -- advertising -- and the product it offers is not essential to the U.S. economy or society.

title: Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes calls for the company to be broken up
text: In a New York Times op-ed, Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes says the company has gotten too powerful and should be broken up.

title: Huckabee: If Facebook starts controlling what we see, that's election meddling
text: Fox News contributor Mike Huckabee discusses how Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes is calling for the social media giant to be broken up.

title: Breaking up Facebook won't solve core issues, says business professor
text: Arun Sundararajan of NYU discusses whether Facebook and big data companies need to be broken up with CNBC's "Power Lunch" team.

title: Splitting up Facebook does not solve problems like fake news, says AEI's Pethokoukis
text: Tony Romm, Washington Post tech policy reporter, and Jimmy Pethokoukis, AEI, join 'The Exchange' to discuss Facebook following the co-founder calling for its break up.

title: Call to break up Facebook 'preposterous', says expert
text: Divya Narendra, co-founder of the Harvard Connection with classmates Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, the concept which would then become Facebook, joins 'Fast Money Halftime Report' to discuss the calls for the break-up of Facebook.

title: Explainer: What would it take for U.S. regulators to break up Facebook?
text: Facebook Inc co-founder and Mark Zuckerberg's former college roommate Chris Hughes urged U.S. regulators to break up the social media company in a New York Times opinion piece on Thursday.

title: Facebook VR VP Hugo Barra is being replaced
text: Facebook’s VP of VR product Hugo Barra is out after some leadership changes at the top of the Oculus organization. He’ll be stepping down into a new role leading global AR/VR partnerships, while Eric Tseng, Facebook’s director of product management, will be replacing Barra in a new title as head of VR product management.

title: Facebook needs to be broken up, says Senator Richard Blumenthal
text: Sen. Richard Blumenthal (D-Conn.) joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss growing calls to regulate and big up big tech firms.

title: Time For A Facebook Breakup, Says Co-Founder Of Social Media Giant
text: Mark Zuckerberg's influence "is staggering, far beyond that of anyone else in the private sector or in government," says Chris Hughes, who helped found Facebook with Zuckerberg at Harvard.

title: Instagram will block hashtag pages full of vaccine misinfo
text: Instagram will begin blocking vaccine-related hashtag pages when content surfaced on a hashtag page features a large proportion of verifiably false content about vaccines. If there is some violating content but under that threshold, Instagram will lock a hashtag into a “Top-only” post where Recent posts won’t show up to decrease visibility of problematic content.

title: 3 Stocks to Buy as Fear Runs Amok
text: Panic is in the air, but some stocks are holding firm and deserve your attention. Here are three stocks to buy.

title: Facebook co-founder, Chris Hughes, calls for Facebook to be broken up
text: The latest call to break up Facebook looks to be the most uncomfortably close to home yet for supreme leader, Mark Zuckerberg. “Mark’s power is unprecedented and un-American,” writes Chris Hughes, in an explosive op-ed published in the New York Times.

title: Cramer: Teddy Roosevelt wouldn't even break up Facebook
text: Theodore Roosevelt, known for targeting monopolies like Standard Oil, would not break up Facebook, says CNBC's Jim Cramer

title: Facebook Tightens Its Grip on Instagram, Adding 3 In-House Leaders
text: Will the social network’s insider management choices strangle its financial growth golden goose?

title: Facebook co-founder calls for its break up, says Zuckerberg has 'unilateral control over speech'
text: Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes wrote in a New York Times op-ed that regulators must check CEO Mark Zuckerberg's power.

title: Facebook co-founder says it is time to break up the company
text: Facebook Inc co-founder and former Mark Zuckerberg roommate Chris Hughes has called for the break up of the social network in an opinion piece in the New York Times.

title: Facebook co-founder Chris Hughes calls for the breakup of the company
text: The co-founder of Facebook is calling for the government to break up the tech giant in an op-ed article published in The New York Times Thursday morning.
